column1: SW210 CLAPHAM JUNCTION TO READING (VIA RICHMOND)
See entry under route – SW100 and also Adjustments to Sectional Running Times below
For all freight timing loads in the Up Direction on Fast Line or Slow Line
Trains passing towards Latchmere Junction orLonghedge Junction
Between all movements except as below
Down passenger trains passing towardsBarnes Bridge
Down freight passing towards Barnes Bridge
Up passenger trains passing from BarnesBridge
* This allowance should appear in the section from Barnes
Adjustments to Sectional Running Times for up freight trains passing from Barnes Bridge. Allowancesshould be applied at the next timing point after Barnes.
